"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5346135e63687219a2dd0100#post_5346135e63687219a2dd0100
The very idea scares me.
Not just button eyes.

Sewn mouths, grosteque shaped father, torture, spiders, cramped areas, the antagonist's actual plan and the fate of those children.

God, if it wasn't such a good movie, I wouldn't be tempted to watch it again.
